mapper.select: SELECT student.*, banji.class_name as banji_name, bus_base_info.number as bus_number, bus_stations.station_name AS board_station_morning_name FROM student LEFT JOIN banji ON banji.id = student.banji LEFT JOIN bus_line ON bus_line.id = student.bus_line_morning LEFT JOIN bus_base_info ON bus_base_info.id = bus_line.bus_base_info LEFT JOIN bus_stations ON bus_stations.id = student.board_station_morning WHERE bus_base_info.number = #{busNumber}

SELECT student.*, banji.class_name as banji_name, bus_base_info.number as bus_number, bus_stations.station_name AS board_station_afternoon_name FROM student LEFT JOIN banji ON banji.id = student.banji LEFT JOIN bus_line ON bus_line.id = student.bus_line_afternoon LEFT JOIN bus_base_info ON bus_base_info.id = bus_line.bus_base_info LEFT JOIN bus_stations ON bus_stations.id = student.board_station_afternoon WHERE bus_base_info.number = #{busNumber}

SELECT student.*, banji.class_name as banji_name, bus_base_info.number as bus_number, bus_stations.station_name AS board_station_afternoon_name FROM student LEFT JOIN banji ON banji.id = student.banji LEFT JOIN bus_line ON bus_line.id = student.bus_line_afternoon LEFT JOIN bus_base_info ON bus_base_info.id = bus_line.bus_base_info LEFT JOIN bus_stations ON bus_stations.id = student.board_station_afternoon WHERE banji.class_name = #{className}

SELECT student.*, banji.class_name as banji_name, bus_base_info.number as bus_number, bus_stations_a.station_name as board_station_afternoon_name, bus_stations_m.station_name as board_station_morning_name FROM student LEFT JOIN banji ON banji.id = student.banji LEFT JOIN bus_line ON bus_line.id = student.bus_line_afternoon LEFT JOIN bus_base_info ON bus_base_info.id = bus_line.bus_base_info LEFT JOIN bus_stations as bus_stations_a ON bus_stations_a.id = student.board_station_afternoon LEFT JOIN bus_stations as bus_stations_m ON bus_stations_m.id = student.board_station_morning WHERE student.student_number = #{studentNumber}

SELECT student.*, banji.class_name as banji_name, bus_base_info.number as bus_number, bus_stations.station_name AS board_station_morning_name FROM student LEFT JOIN banji ON banji.id = student.banji LEFT JOIN bus_line ON bus_line.id = student.bus_line_morning LEFT JOIN bus_base_info ON bus_base_info.id = bus_line.bus_base_info LEFT JOIN bus_stations ON bus_stations.id = student.board_station_morning WHERE bus_base_info.number = #{busNumber} AND bus_stations.station_name = #{busStation} AND bus_line.`mode` = '早班'
